name: FBX Express Ring Main Unit
description: FBX Express covers a wide range of applications for MV secondary distribution up to 12 kV. It is an ideal solution for building applications such as: offices,hotels, shops...

features.name: Range
features.description: Gas insulated switchgear 12 kV 21kA/3sec suitable for transformer protection from 200 kVA up to 2500 kVA.

features.name: Safety and Compliance
features.description: Comply to IEC – 62271-100 standard and are IAC – AFL tested. The new designed IP54 enclosure brings extended lifetime for outdoor installations.
